edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.monitors

Class DomainMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.monitors.DomainMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.math3.ode.events.EventHandler

    public class DomainMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.math3.ode.events.EventHandler
    Continuously monitors the system to interrupt the system upon each jump detected. This allows the ODE to function smoothly as the discontinuities are addressed discretely while the solver is paused Intended Operator: System

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.commons.math3.ode.events.EventHandler

        org.apache.commons.math3.ode.events.EventHandler.Action

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean approachingJump
      flag indicating that the environment is approaching a jump, meaning that a jump has been detected by the ode but the pre-jump value has not been finalized
      private EngineSupervisor manager
      supervisor of the environment that this instance works for
      java.lang.Double toggleFlag
      toggle value that switches sign if an event has occurred since the last check

    • Constructor Summary
